summary: Yehudi Menuhin, Baron Menuhin, OM, KBE  was a violinist and conductor.
full_text: Yehudi Menuhin, Baron Menuhin OM KBE  was an American-born British and Swiss violinist and conductor who spent most of his performing career in the United Kingdom. He became a citizen of Switzerland in 1970, and a British citizen in 1985. He is widely considered one of the greatest violinists of the 20th century.
title: Yehudi Menuhin
